edu.asu.ying.mapreduce.rpc.messaging

Interface MessageSink

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    ReceiveMessageHandler, SendChannelTransportSink, ServerTableProxy
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    KadSendTransportSink, MessageDispatch, ServerTable, ServerTableProvider, SimpleReceiveFormatterSink, SimpleResponseFormatterSink, SimpleSendFormatterSink, SimpleServerTableProxy

    public interface MessageSink
    Data moving into or out of the application domain, e.g. from disk to the network, pass through a chain of MessageSink objects in the form of a Message. Each MessageSink receives the message, performs an operation, and passes the message to the next sink in the chain.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      MessageSink getNextMessageSink()
      Returns the next MessageSink in the chain.
      Message processMessage(Message message)
      Processes the given Message and returns a reply Message.

    • Method Detail

      • getNextMessageSink

        MessageSink getNextMessageSink()
        Returns the next MessageSink in the chain.

      • processMessage

        Message processMessage(Message message)
        Processes the given Message and returns a reply Message.
        Parameters:
        message - the message to process.
